title: *SOLD* For Sale T206 Joe Tinker (knees) Piedmont @ $75 *SOLD*

posts.post_title: *SOLD* For Sale T206 Joe Tinker (knees) Piedmont @ $75 *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
I have the following raw T206 Joe Tinker for sale *SOLD* $75 (delivered) *SOLD*.  Card has been slightly trimmed on the top border but is otherwise nice.  No creases, but does have some slight faint indentation on the bottom border and right corner. As an FYI: this card was slightly soaked in water to remove a little bit of scrapbook residue on the back (paper was in the upper part of the card).  Paypal, check, money order all work for me. Thanks for looking.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=57926&d=1330455703[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=57927&d=1330455714[/IMG]

Lovely Day...
I'll take it, Iggy.  PM sent.
